answer: 📶 Wi-Fi is available in all rooms and public areas. Password is provided at check-in.
🏊 Pool is open from 6 AM to 10 PM. Towels provided at the poolside.
🍳 Complimentary breakfast is served from 7 AM to 10 AM.
💪 Gym is open 24/7 and located on the 3rd floor.
🕒 Check-in starts at 3:00 PM. Early check-in subject to availability.
🕚 Check-out time is 11:00 AM. Late checkout available on request.
